Package server

Class ServerControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      • server.ServerControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ServerControl
extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
    main class of server, receives commands from client and sends back needed data or changes database if needed

    Project Name: Zer-Li (Java Application Flower Store)

    Version:
    V1.00 2022
    Author:
    Habib Ibrahim, Vitaly Rofman, Ibrahim Daoud, Yosif Hosen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void activeDiscount​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      activeDiscount - activating discount for catalog, change prices, save origin price and save the amount of discount
      private void addNewOrder​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      add new order to order table
      private void approveCustomer​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      approveCustomer method gets the customer's details from the client, inserts the customer to users list (users list is for customers), then it inserts the user to login table and removes it from registration table because it's already approved.
      private void calculateRefund​(int orderID, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)  
      private void changePermission​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      changePermission method changes the permission of user according to what it got from client, it does so by accessing the DB - login table - and changing the usertype field in it.
      protected void clientConnected​(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Hook method called each time a new client connection is accepted.
      protected void clientDisconnected​(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Hook method called each time a client disconnects.
      static void closeAll()
      close all connections, client connections and database connection
      private void confirmCancellation​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Method(confirmCancellation) updates the status of the order in relevant tables in DB to cancelled
      private void confirmDelivery​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      confirmDelivery - server receives message from client about confirming specific deliver order
      private void confirmFreeze​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      confirmFreeze method updates the login status field in the DB to 'frozen' for userid sent by client.
      private void confirmOrder​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Method(confirmOrder) updates the order in DB to confirm
      private void confirmUnfreeze​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      confirmUnfreeze method updates the login status field in the DB to 'active' for userid sent by client.
      private void CreateCancellationRequest​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      create new cancellation request in cancelationrequests table
      private void deliveryOrders​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      deliveryOrders - this function made to collect data from server for DeliveryGuy GUI TableView
      private void disconnect​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)  
      private void DistinctiveDiscount​(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      DistinctiveDiscount - ends the discount, return origin price to catalog, update all filed as in origin
      private void getAllTheShops​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      get all the shops name and send them to client
      private void getCreditCardData​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      send credit card data to client
      private void getInfo​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Method(getInfo) extracts the phone number and email from DB
      private void getName​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      getName method gets an userid and sends the first and last name that belongs to that userid to the client asked for it.
      private void getOrderDetails​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      send order details of requested order by its orderName
      private void getOrders​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      send orders of specific client by his id
      private void getQuantityRows​(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      getQuantityRows - calculate amount of rows in Data Base and return the value to client
      private void getSurveyLink​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      getSurveyLink - client asks for specific survey , server send survey file as byte array.
      private void getUserData​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      send user data from users table and his balance from balance table
      protected void handleMessageFromClient​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles a command sent from one client to the server.
      private void ifDiscount​(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      ifDiscount - checks if discount is available in catalog, or there is no discount.
      private void initTableForDelivery​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      initTableForDelivery - init table for delivery guy
      private void insertComplaint​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      insertComplaint - inserting complaint to DataBase from Customer service
      private void insertSurveyAnswers​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      insertSurveyAnswers - insert survey answers for specific client into Data Base
      private void isFirstOrder​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      check in userorders table if user (by its id) doesn't have orders, send true, else false
      private void login​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      login new user, send his login data from DB (type of user, account banned/active etc...)
      private void logout​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      logout connected user by removing it from connected users list
      private void manageCustomers​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      manageCustomers method gets an information from 2 tables DB and sends it to the client who asked for it.
      private void manageUsers​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      manageUsers method is responsible for accessing the DB and sending the information regarding the customers in registration table to the client who asked for it
      private void reviewCancellation​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Method(reviewCancellation) to extract the cancellation requests from the DB depends on the manager shop
      private void reviewOrdersToConfirm​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Method(reviewOrdersToConfirm) extracts from DB the relevant orders that are waiting for manager to confirm
      private void sendCatalog​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      send catalog data
      private void sendItemPicture​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      send picture of item from catalog
      protected void serverStarted()
      Hook method called when the server starts listening for connections.
      protected void serverStopped()
      Hook method called when the server stops accepting connections.
      static void setConnection​(ServerControl svconn)  
      private void setSurveyQuestions​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      setSurveyQuestions - collect the survey question and return it asa CachedRowSet message to client
      private void setUpSQL​(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      setUpSQL - set up data for delivery guy in table
      private void showUsersPermissionsTable​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      showUsersPermissionsTable method is responsible for accessing the DB, getting the users' info from login table and sending it to the client who asked for it.
      private void surveyResults​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      surveyResults - this function made to collect data from server for Customer Services GUI TableView
      private void updateBalance​(int orderID, double refund)
      Method(updateBalance) lookup the relevant user that cancelled the order and update his balance depends on the refund .
      private void viewComplaint​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Method(viewComplaint) that extract number of complaints from DB depends on the requested quarter and shop
      private void viewMonthlyReport​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Method(viewMonthlyReport) extract already made monthly reports details from DB
      private void viewOverallIncome​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Method(viewOverallIncome) that extract overall income from DB depends on the requested quarter and shop
      private void viewReports​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Method(viewReports) that extracts the relevant shops to show for users depends on the id and on his type if shop manager only his shop , if ceo shows all shops
      private void viewSpecificReports​(java.lang.Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Method(viewSpecificReports) that extract report details from DB depends on the requested type , shop and dates .

      • clientConnected

        protected void clientConnected​(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        Description copied from class: ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Hook method called each time a new client connection is accepted. The default implementation does nothing.
        Overrides:
        clientConnected in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        client - the connection connected to the client.

      • clientDisconnected

        protected void clientDisconnected​(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        Description copied from class: ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Hook method called each time a client disconnects. The default implementation does nothing. The method may be overridden by subclasses but should remains synchronized.
        Overrides:
        clientDisconnected in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        client - the connection with the client.

      • serverStarted

        protected void serverStarted()
        Description copied from class: ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Hook method called when the server starts listening for connections. The default implementation does nothing. The method may be overridden by subclasses.
        Overrides:
        serverStarted in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer

      • serverStopped

        protected void serverStopped()
        Description copied from class: ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Hook method called when the server stops accepting connections. The default implementation does nothing. This method may be overriden by subclasses.
        Overrides:
        serverStopped in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer

      • handleMessageFromClient

        protected void handleMessageFromClient​(java.lang.Object msg,
                                       ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        Description copied from class: ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Handles a command sent from one client to the server. This MUST be implemented by subclasses, who should respond to messages. This method is called by a synchronized method so it is also implcitly synchronized.
        Specified by:
        handleMessageFromClient in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        msg - the message sent.
        client - the connection connected to the client that sent the message.

      • calculateRefund

        private void calculateRefund​(int orderID,
                             ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        orderID - - order id that we want to calculate the refund for after cancellation
        client - - receives specific client connection
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - sendin to client exception
        java.sql.SQLException - Method(calculateRefund) calculates the time difference between delivery date and cancellation request date depends on that calculates the relevant refund for customer .

      • updateBalance

        private void updateBalance​(int orderID,
                           double refund)
        Method(updateBalance) lookup the relevant user that cancelled the order and update his balance depends on the refund .
        Parameters:
        orderID - - order id that we cancelled
        refund - - the total amount of refund .
